text: Shito yo, tagaini fushinjin ni kisou mono no tame ni anata no kokoro o itamete wa naranai. Kare-ra wa Ro de,`watashi-tachi wa shinko suru.' To iuga, kokorode wa shinjite wa inai. Mata yudayahito no nakaniha, kyogi o kikidasu koto bakari ni nesshinde, anata no sho ni mattaku yoritsukanai mono ga iru. Kare-ra wa sono kotoba o (tadashi) imi kara yugamete iu. `Moshi kore ga, anata gata ni atae rareta mono (rippo to onajidearu) to omounaraba, ukeire nasai. Daga anata gata ni atae rareta mono to onajidenainaraba, yojin shi nasai.' Arra ga ichido kokoromi ni kakeyou to o nozomi no mono ni wa, anata wa kare-ra no tame, arra ni taishi nani no ken'i mo nai. Korera no mono wa, arra ga sono kokoro o kiyomeru no o, nozoma renai-sha-tachidearu. Kare-ra wa gense ni oite kutsujoku o uke, raise ni oite mo hidoi chobatsu o ukerudearou
